name: IndianFoodRecipes
0:
”Alexa open Indian Food Recipes”
”Find the Kati Roll recipe”
”Find recipes with Lamb”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: indian food recipes
des:
Get your taste buds flowing with one of the World’s best Indian Cuisine Michelin Starred Chefs. Atul ensures he makes his mouth-watering recipes taken from his Mayfair Restaurant in London and creates easy to follow, step by step instructions for you to make at home, all in a simple video. ‘From Tawa to Table’.

You don’t need to be an experienced Chef yourself, anyone from home kitchen cook to the complete chef can follow these guides and enjoy this World-class Indian Food culinary delight. 

Exclusively available on Amazon Alexa, Chef walks you through his dishes from start to finish. Simple is an understatement. 

Chef Atul breaks down all the barriers of ‘Indian food being complicated’, some of his recipes can be done in minutes with very little effort! 

Ask for the list of recipes or directly ask for a recipe using its Indian or English name like '"What's the recipe for 'Spicy Vegetable Wrap'" or "What's the recipe for 'Kosha Mangsho'" 

Chef Atul's recipes are also available as audio files on non-display Echo devices.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
